Title: WPF Routed Command Sample
Description: This is a sample application that demonstrates how to use WPF RoutedCommand.  This sample is a really nice example because it is a WPF desktop application that uses the Frame control.  The advantage to this is that you can dynamically load WPF Page instances into the Frame control and send them routed commands.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a sample application that demonstrates how to use WPF RoutedCommand. This sample is a really nice example because it is a WPF desktop application that uses the Frame control. The advantage to this is that you can dynamically load WPF Page instances into the Frame control and send them routed commands.
